title: Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site: Fire Regime
body: Explore This Park        Fire Regime         2000 Prescribed Fire, the first at Fort Union Trading Post NHS Paula Andersen  Nature & Science Fire Regime  The park implemented a prescribed fire program in 2000. As part of the management and re-establishment of native grass species, prescribed fire is used to mimic the role that wildfire once played on the prairie. Fire Management Program Center supplemental website http://www.nps.gov/ngpfire/fous.htm
